events.title: Form team of specialists
events.description: This is the very start of our journey, we formed a team, and discussed the project and it's future plans!

events.title: Start drawing the Fox collection
events.description: Fun fact: we started with an idea of creating female Boss Cats, they were going to be called "Miss Cats", but as we started drawing them, something didn't feel right. That's when we started from scratch and Bad Fox MC was born!

events.title: Contact other teams and plan potential collaborations
events.description: We have ambitious goals to bring our holders into the metaverse, and therefore we are in talks with teams such as: OGBears, CardaStacks, Ada Realms, Boss Cat Custom Club, and others. These discussions may resolve with collaborations and added utility to our roadmap, and these discussions may also be rejected, so please don't view these projects as confirmed partners just yet.

events.title: Launch Twitter and Discord
events.description: Twitter has been created at end of March, and Discord has been opened to the public early April. We are focused on organic, purely authentic growth, with genuine people, many efforts have been made to prevent any bots from accessing the server or obtaining certain roles.

events.title: Develop official website
events.description: Website devlopment is initially focused on showing our artwork, display information about our plans, and expose the team. At a later stage the website will include the minting portal as well as offical partners, and some cool community tools.

events.title: Build community, run events and competitions
events.description: As previously mentioned, we are focused on organic growth, we're exposing our community and project to some of the best projects on Cardano, rewarding active members with OG roles, and every OG can gift 3 whitelist roles to their friends, we've received lots of positive feedback about this innovative approach. We have events announced almost every week for new OG roles, just tune into Discord!

events.title: Continued work on the Fox collection
events.description: At this point we should have both the female and male models ready, and we need to make a last push on creating more traits so that the collection is as unique is possible.

events.title: Start drawing the Motorcycle collection
events.description: We plan on creating our 1st few motorcycle prototypes before we launch our 1st drop, so that our community can benefit from an early insight of what is expected after we mint the fox collection.

events.title: Increase marketing and exposure
events.description: Just before the fox collection launches, we will increase marketing and exposure per demand. We will make proper evaluations about our marketing approach according to our rate of growth by this time.

events.title: Launch 1st collection: Fox
events.description: There will be 6,000 fox minted - half of which are female, and the other half are male. Mint prices vary between 35-55 ADA, depends if you are OG, WL, or public.

events.title: ADA payouts to Fox holders
events.description: We're planning to run certain games or events every week, to reward holders of winning traits with ADA. We're also going to distribute the majority of our royalties to every holder every month!

events.title: Announce official collaborations!
events.description: By this time we expect to have established partnerships with metaverse projects and teams, and this is when we plan on announcing these collaborations.

events.title: Continued work on the Motorcycle collection
events.description: Increase the rate of production, and work on sneak peeks for the motorcycle collection.

events.title: Launch 2nd collection: Motorcycle
events.description: There will be 3,000 motorcycles minted. Mint price(s) are yet to be determined.

events.title: ADA payouts to Motorcycle holders
events.description: Similar to the fox collection, we will be paying every motorcycle holder every month using majority of royalties. However, unlike the fox collection, we will not be doing weekly events for the motorcycle collection.

events.title: Hot announcements coming! (burn, airdrop, metaverse)
events.description: Early next year, we want to do a burn event which holders can burn 1 male fox + 1 female fox + 1 motorcycle, and get a 3rd generation token in return, that token will reward holders lifetime airdrops, metaverse related. To achieve this ambitous plan we have established contact with other teams through 2022, and will continue to do so in 2023.
